statements: SELECT * FROM ResearchData WHERE research_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM ResearchData WHERE research_id = 2;
SELECT research_data FROM ResearchData WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM ResearchData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT research_topic, blockchain_hash FROM ResearchData WHERE research_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ResearchData WHERE researcher_name='John Doe' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT research_topic, research_data FROM ResearchData WHERE research_id = 1
SELECT research_id, researcher_name, research_topic FROM ResearchData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY research_id ASC
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(research_id) AS total_research FROM ResearchData GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING total_research > 1
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM ResearchData
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE research_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_data ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT research_id, researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE 'machine%';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_ledger ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT research_topic, researcher_name FROM research_data ORDER BY research_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_research FROM research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS total_research FROM research_data GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT research_id, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT researcher_id, name, email FROM researcher_profiles WHERE affiliation='University';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_ledger ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT research_topic, researcher_id FROM research_data JOIN researcher_profiles ON research_data.researcher_id = researcher_profiles.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY research_topic DESC
SELECT research_topic, researcher_id, research_data FROM research_data WHERE permission_level = 3 ORDER BY researcher_id ASC
SELECT research_data, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND permission_level < 4
SELECT r.name, r.email, r.affiliation, rd.research_topic, rd.research_data FROM researcher_profiles r JOIN research_data rd ON r.researcher_id = rd.researcher_id
SELECT b.block_id, b.timestamp, rd.research_id, rd.researcher_id, rd.research_topic FROM blockchain_ledger b JOIN research_data rd ON b.research_id = rd.research_id WHERE b.timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM medical_research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM medical_research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT research_id, research_topic FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM authorized_researchers ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, organization FROM authorized_researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM medical_research_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM authorized_researchers ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, organization FROM authorized_researchers WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT research_id, researcher_name, research_topic FROM medical_research_data JOIN data_access_logs ON medical_research_data.research_id = data_access_logs.research_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_research_data WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Cancer Research';
SELECT * FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, research_date FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY research_date ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%COVID%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM medical_research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND research_topic = 'Cancer Research' ORDER BY research_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, research_date FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_date >= '2021-01-01' AND authorized = true ORDER BY research_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'Jane Smith' AND data_protection_level = 'High' AND blockchain_synced = true ORDER BY research_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT research_topic, researcher_name, access_level FROM medical_research_data WHERE access_level IN ('Admin', 'Researcher') AND transparency = 'Full' ORDER BY access_level;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, data_protection_level FROM medical_research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%Security%' AND authorized = true ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
